category.name: Product Structure.Design Context.Performance Tuning
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_convert_ves_to_new_variant_model_by_default
preference.preference_description: Allows the conversion or migration of old format VES (Variant Expressions) to new variant model VES by default. If the value is set to "true", the old format VES will be converted into new variant model VES. The default value is "false".
